Title: Relates to the prohibition on certain databases and registries
Summary: Provides that no state or local agency, or any agent thereof, may use any funds, facilities, property, equipment or personnel of such agency to investigate, enforce or provide assistance in the investigation or enforcement of any federal program requiring registration of individuals, or maintaining a database of individuals, on the basis of race, color, creed, gender, sexual orientation, religion or national or ethnic origin.
LawCode: Add ยง79-r, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the prohibition on certain databases and registries
